languages.text: "На колыбель твоих предков зарится черный дракон, коварный и брызжущий ядом. Из дома расходятся множество троп, но обратно к нему ведет лишь одна, черная и горестная. Не медли, ступив на нее! Не медли!"

traits.locale_text: "На колыбель твоих предков зарится черный дракон, коварный и брызжущий ядом. Из дома расходятся множество троп, но обратно к нему ведет лишь одна, черная и горестная. Не медли, ступив на нее! Не медли!"

languages.text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"
languages.original_text: "На колыбель твоих предков зарится черный дракон, коварный и брызжущий ядом. Из дома расходятся множество троп, но обратно к нему ведет лишь одна, черная и горестная. Не медли, ступив на нее! Не медли!"

traits.locale_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

"In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

"In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

"In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

languages.text: “在你先祖的摇篮之中，有一头饥渴而狡猾的巨龙在吐着毒液。许多条道路从故乡延伸出来，但只有一条道路能返回故乡，一条充满悲伤的黑路。当你踏上这条路的时候，脚步要快！快点！再快点！”
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: “在你先祖的摇篮之中，有一头饥渴而狡猾的巨龙在吐着毒液。许多条道路从故乡延伸出来，但只有一条道路能返回故乡，一条充满悲伤的黑路。当你踏上这条路的时候，脚步要快！快点！再快点！”

languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

languages.text: «En la cuna de sus ancestros, un taimado dragón negro espera con ansia, escupiendo veneno. Muchos caminos salen de casa, pero solo uno vuelve a ella, negro y rebosante de dolor. Cuando empiece a seguirlo, ¡corra! ¡Corra!».
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: «En la cuna de sus ancestros, un taimado dragón negro espera con ansia, escupiendo veneno. Muchos caminos salen de casa, pero solo uno vuelve a ella, negro y rebosante de dolor. Cuando empiece a seguirlo, ¡corra! ¡Corra!».

languages.text: 「あなたたちの父祖の揺りかごでは、黒いドラゴンが飢え、狡猾に毒を吐いている。多くの道が故郷から続いているが、ただ一つ、黒く悲しみに満ちた道だけが故郷へと戻ることができる。その道を歩き始めたら、急ぐのよ！どうか！」
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたたちの父祖の揺りかごでは、黒いドラゴンが飢え、狡猾に毒を吐いている。多くの道が故郷から続いているが、ただ一つ、黒く悲しみに満ちた道だけが故郷へと戻ることができる。その道を歩き始めたら、急ぐのよ！どうか！」

languages.text: "In der Wiege Eurer Ahnen hungert ein schwarzer Drache, gerissen und giftspeiend. Viele Pfade führen von Zuhause fort, doch nur einer führt zurück, schwarz und voller Trauer. Wenn Ihr diesen Pfad einschlagt, sputet Euch! Sputet Euch!"
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: "In der Wiege Eurer Ahnen hungert ein schwarzer Drache, gerissen und giftspeiend. Viele Pfade führen von Zuhause fort, doch nur einer führt zurück, schwarz und voller Trauer. Wenn Ihr diesen Pfad einschlagt, sputet Euch! Sputet Euch!"

languages.text: « Dans le berceau de vos ancêtres, un dragon noir affamé crache le venin de la fourberie. Bien des voies s'offrent à vous, mais une seule, sombre et pavée de chagrin, vous permettra de rentrer chez vous. Une fois la voie choisie, hâtez-vous ! Hâtez-vous ! »
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: « Dans le berceau de vos ancêtres, un dragon noir affamé crache le venin de la fourberie. Bien des voies s'offrent à vous, mais une seule, sombre et pavée de chagrin, vous permettra de rentrer chez vous. Une fois la voie choisie, hâtez-vous ! Hâtez-vous ! »

languages.text: "Atalarının ana vatanında kara bir ejderha açlık çekiyor. Hem kurnaz hem de zehir kusuyor. Yuvandan pek çok yol ayrılıyor. Ancak geri dönen o tek yol, karalara ve kedere bulanıyor. Yola adım attığın vakit acele et! Acele et!"
languages.original_text: "In the cradle of your ancestors, a black dragon hungers, cunning and spitting venom. Many paths lead from home, but only one leads back to it, black and full of sorrow. When you start along the path, make haste! Make haste!"

traits.locale_text: "Atalarının ana vatanında kara bir ejderha açlık çekiyor. Hem kurnaz hem de zehir kusuyor. Yuvandan pek çok yol ayrılıyor. Ancak geri dönen o tek yol, karalara ve kedere bulanıyor. Yola adım attığın vakit acele et! Acele et!"
